name: Upholstery and slipcovers
description:
This chair is a vintage chair produced sometime between the 1920’s and 1940’s.  It has been re-upholstered in a wool blend.  I love its clean sheek look! contact for delivery details.

	Custom slipcovers and upholstery are also available. As well as all sewing for the home including throw pillows and draperies.

	Please contact for a quote.

name: Gertie "Brown Swirls"
description: Gertie in Brown Swirls is a fabulous day bag. The soft butter yellow compliments the creamy brown and the ribbon adds a little pizzaz. This neutral number will go with all! It is made with 100% cotton and has 3 interior pockets perfect for your cell phone, a pack of gum and business cards. Stats 17” wide, 7” high, 5” deep, 19 1/2” handle

name: Tasket "Retro Garden"
description: Tiny, but she does the job. Tasket is a great little hand clutch great for a lunch date. It is 100% cotton and has 2 interior pockets, perfect for your cell phone. Stats 10 1/2”wide, 6 1/2”high, 3”deep

name: Gertie "Sun Flower"
description: One of my fav’s! This retro floral combines pink, brown and yellow beautifully, great with a sundress. It is made with 100% cotton and has 3 interior pockets perfect for your cell phone, pack of gum and business cards. Stats 17” wide, 7” high, 5” deep, 19 1/2” handle
